nodes.text: Huwin Clathor was a male Human geode miner who lived on the planet Endregaad during the reign of the New Republic. Clathor operated in the Temple Valley region of the world and at some point, he had some dealings with the Hutt Mika Anjiliac Chiera. In 19 ABY, there was an outbreak of a deadly viral disease on the world, and Clathor contracted the contagion. Clathor was an honest and sharp-eyed individual.
